name: Senior Technical Services Analyst.txt
content:
SENIOR TECHNICAL SERVICES ANALYST
New Look Retailers Ltd | February 2025 - Current

笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊申n
沒 ROLE OVERVIEW
Technical authority for infrastructure operations, overseeing Azure, Windows Server (DNS/DHCP), Active Directory (GPO), and FTP, ensuring optimal performance and security.

沁ｯ KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

窶｢ Architected & led the WMF framework upgrade for legacy OS, enabling Azure data collection integration
窶｢ Developed & delivered PowerShell training, equipping IT teams with automation expertise
窶｢ Principal lead for security hardening post-cybersecurity concerns in the retail space (April 2025)
窶｢ Implemented Tenable Identity Exposure and vulnerability management solutions
窶｢ Provided strategic mentorship to junior team members
窶｢ Led cross-departmental initiatives, collaborating across IT, security, and operations
窶｢ Directed cloud identity & access management within Azure Entra ID

沛 MAJOR ACHIEVEMENTS
窶｢ Successfully coordinated remediation with internal and external cybersecurity experts
窶｢ Ensured long-term scalability through WMF framework upgrade
窶｢ Advanced operational efficiency through PowerShell automation training
窶｢ Drove corrective actions to ensure compliance through identity monitoring
窶｢ Shaped governance policies and secure authentication frameworks
窶｢ Designed and deployed Windows Hello for Business company-wide
窶｢ Assumed ownership of in-flight project to replace PKI infrastructure, delivering both an updated certificate solution and a more robust VPN solution

汳ｻ TECHNOLOGIES USED
Azure, Windows Server 2003-2022, Active Directory, PowerShell,
Tenable One exposure management, DNS/DHCP, FTP

name: Technical Services Analyst.txt
content:
TECHNICAL SERVICES ANALYST
New Look Retailers Ltd | December 2023 - February 2025

笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊申n
沒 ROLE OVERVIEW
Oversaw server and storage management in a hybrid 24/7 environment, supporting M365 & enterprise applications while leading data centre operations.

沁ｯ KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
窶｢ Supported M365 & enterprise applications, ensuring stability and availability
窶｢ Led data centre operations, handling access, upgrades, and hardware maintenance
窶｢ Provided 3rd-line infrastructure security support
窶｢ Managed FTP transfers via MOVEit for internal and external stakeholders

沛 MAJOR ACHIEVEMENTS
窶｢ Maintained high availability in critical 24/7 environment
窶｢ Ensured enterprise application stability across hybrid infrastructure
窶｢ Implemented environmental monitoring solution in data centre
窶｢ Delivered automated solutions through PowerShell scripting
窶｢ Developed PIM solution for Azure role permissions across the business
汳ｻ TECHNOLOGIES USED
Microsoft 365, PowerShell, Progress FTP solution (MOVEit transfer/automation), Azure, Active Directory,
DNS, DHCP, virtualisation (VMWare and Azure Local)

name: Infrastructure Security Analyst.txt
content:
INFRASTRUCTURE SECURITY ANALYST
New Look Retailers Ltd | July 2023 - December 2023

笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊申n
沒 ROLE OVERVIEW
Focused on security infrastructure management including OS patching, endpoint protection deployment, and Azure Arc implementation.

沁ｯ KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
窶｢ Managed OS patching, balancing security and operational impact
窶｢ Onboarded Windows Server 2012R2+ into Microsoft Defender
窶｢ Led SentinelOne AV deployment for legacy Windows Server OS (2003-2008R2)
窶｢ Researched & implemented Azure Arc, leading managed server integration
窶｢ Independently researched, deployed & optimized Azure Update Manager for automated server patching
窶｢ Assisted cybersecurity remediation post-Purple Team event
窶｢ Managed OS in-place upgrades to 2012R2 OS where available

沛 MAJOR ACHIEVEMENTS
窶｢ Successfully balanced security requirements with operational continuity
窶｢ Modernized endpoint protection across diverse server environment
窶｢ Pioneered Azure Arc implementation for legacy system management
窶｢ Automated patching processes reducing manual overhead
窶｢ Contributed to cybersecurity incident response and remediation

汳ｻ TECHNOLOGIES USED
Microsoft Defender, SentinelOne, Azure Arc, Azure Update Manager,
Windows Server 2003-2022

name: End User Computing Analyst.txt
content:
END USER COMPUTING ANALYST
New Look Retailers Ltd | March 2022 - July 2023

笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊絶武笊申n
沒 ROLE OVERVIEW
Managed hardware provisioning & asset tracking for 500+ users while providing comprehensive IT support across the UK and maintaining hybrid infrastructure.

沁ｯ KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
窶｢ Managed hardware provisioning & asset tracking (500+ users) via MDM & ServiceNow
窶｢ Provided remote & deskside IT support across the UK
窶｢ Maintained M365 & hybrid Active Directory environment
窶｢ Served as key escalation contact for iPad & Surface tablet incidents
窶｢ Acted as interim team lead, managing ticket escalation and VIP incidents

沛 MAJOR ACHIEVEMENTS
窶｢ Successfully managed large-scale hardware deployment for 500+ users
窶｢ Delivered comprehensive UK-wide IT support coverage
窶｢ Maintained high service levels as escalation contact for critical incidents
窶｢ Demonstrated leadership capabilities in interim team lead role
窶｢ Ensured smooth operation of hybrid M365/AD environment

汳ｻ TECHNOLOGIES USED
Intune, Systems Centre Configuration Manager, MobileIron, ServiceNow, Microsoft 365,
 Active Directory,Windows 10/11, Exchange (hybrid)
